data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 6,201,000 people living in Chiba, Japan. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chiba, Japan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Chiba. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 35,109 believers find a person of peace today among the 6,165,891 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Chiba, Japan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Chiba, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Chiba access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Chiba to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

location.name: Chiba
location.people_groups_list: Mongol, Khalka, Punjabi, South Asian, Bengali-speaking, Persian, Malay
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mongol, Khalka (4,500), Punjabi (70,000), South Asian, Bengali-speaking (69,000), Persian (50,000), Malay (9,900)
